summary: An opportunistic businessman tries to pass off a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia, and she is so convincing that even the biggest skeptics believe her.
cast: Ingrid Bergman|Yul Brynner|Helen Hayes|Akim Tamiroff|Martita Hunt|Felix Aylmer|Sacha Pitoëff|Ivan Desny|Natalie Schafer|Grégoire Gromoff|Karel Stepanek|Ina De La Haye|Katherine Kath|John Adams|Paul Beradi|Paul Bildt|Newton Blick|Ernest Blyth|Alexis Bobrinskoy|Marguerite Brennan|Paula Catton|Pauline Chamberlain|Allan Cuthbertson|Ivor Dean|Maroussia Dimitrevitch|Edward Forsyth|Otto Friese|Melvyn Hayes|Hy Hazell|John G. Heller|Tutte Lemkow|André Mikhelson|Richard Neller|Nora Nicholson|Polycarpe Pavloff|Dido Plumb|Eric Pohlmann|Olaf Pooley|George Pravda|Peter Sallis|Tamara Shayne|Anatole Smirnoff|Paddy Smith|George Spence|Emile Stemmler|Olga Valéry|Henri Vidon|John Wilder|Stanley Zevic
title: Anastasia
